entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -8.7°C

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of light snow. High minus 8.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 8. Wind chill minus 19 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Wednesday 29 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 20. POP 40%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries this evening. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 20. Wind chill minus 19 this evening and minus 27 overnight. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Wednesday 29 March 2023
